title: Project Design and Implementation Focus Studio
description: Development, exploration and integration of project design and implementation strategies to design and planning projects. Emphasis on creative and exploratory problem solving, spatial design, project resolution, and graphic communication. Total credit limited to 12 units. 4 laboratories.
prerequisites: LA 204, LA 243, LA 242, LA 241 or consent of instructor
corequisites: Integrated Learning Course (ILC) of student's option
